item.description: JUST COME AND SEE for yourself. Call me for details. 603-382-6609 or email me.
item.how_to_find_us: Call me for directions and confirmation that you will be attending and with how many guests.
item.why: NO ONE knows about this and I and my team are bringing it to New England and beyond. Get in on the ground floor of this exciting trend of the future. I have 19+ yrs of experience in a home based business making a 6 figure income. I will show you too
item.name: The company is paying me a fortune to tell you about this, they will pay you too
